thread.title: Zendaya and James Charles's Makeup Challenge Is So Fun, You'll Wish You Were There
thread.title_full: Zendaya and James Charles's Makeup Challenge Is So Fun, You'll Wish You Were There

author: Emily Orofino
title: Zendaya and James Charles's Makeup Challenge Is So Fun, You'll Wish You Were There
text:
James Charles and Zendaya Makeup Challenge | CoverGirl Zendaya and James Charles's Makeup Challenge Is So Fun, You'll Wish You Were There January 6, 2017 by Emily Orofino 306 Shares 
Ever since CoverGirl made history by naming aspiring makeup artist James Charles as its first male face , we've been dying to see him team up with Zendaya, his fellow brand ambassador. You see, the actress was partially responsible for making the teen go viral â€” she retweeted an image of him and his popping highlight from his high school portraits . Thankfully, CoverGirl has heard our pleas, and they've gotten the two to collaborate. 
Cosmopolitan.com exclusively revealed the above video, which shows the pretty pair doing their makeup together for the very first time . And for their debut, they've chosen to challenge each other to a duel. With just 10 minutes on the clock, the actress and the influencer race to complete a vivid blue and purple shadow look before time is up. You'll crack up as they make jokes and mess up their makeup as they frantically use the CoverGirl Jewels TruNaked Eye Shadow Palette ($13). Watch now to see who reigns supreme! Related:
